metadata.name: The Metro Bridge
metadata.description:
The Metro Bridge was engineered by G. Fuks and Y. Inosov and constructed in 1965 with the expansion of the Kyiv Metro system.

A sculpture of a woman with pigeons adorns the Dnipro metro station. It's called Peace. Installed in 1965, sculptors F.A. Kotsyubinsky, E.M. Kuntsevich, I.S. Gorovoy, B.M. Karlovsky.

Tanya Reckless, artist
Kyiv, Ukraine
July 2021
NFT: 1877x1407 px
